summary: Extracted facegen files to fix the dark face bug. For Version 3.0 of Supermodel Skyrim II Beautiful Bandits - New LITE Version
descriptionHtml:
Extracted facegen files for Supermodel Skyrim II Beautiful Bandits - New LITE Version 3.0 by JeremeW5257 (non Dawnguard) To fix the dark face bug.

It's best used with a new game. I believe that height and weight of npc's are saved in your savegame when you first meet them. So a new game may be the best way to avoid the neck gap bug.

Since I do not plan to purchase Dawnguard, versions 3.1 and 3.2 of SMS will not be supported

Installation
Use NMM , Or copy contents to your data folder

Unistall
Use NMM, Or delete the files from data folder

Requirements
ApachiiSkyHair_V_1_4_Full
ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Supermodel Skyrim II Beautiful Bandits - New LITE Version
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14626

Credits
JeremeW5257 For Supermodel Skyrim
Apachii For ApachiiSkyHair

Usage:
No original authors files have been modified and are subject to the original authors permissions.
author: Stalfos81

files.changelogHtml:
added Aela's facegen files (was somehow missing before)
removed daedric armor from vampires (personal preferance of mine revert to old esp if it doesn't suit you)
changed outfits for all elder ladies to greybeard (the only robes that aren't skimpy with my selected mods)
